texts.es: don adrian de 38 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 10 y 12 años actualmente estudian viven en casa propia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra maiz y hortalizas con las ventas que realiza de sus granos basicos y de sus hortalizas logar cubrir los gastos de su hogar, el solicita un credito que le permita comprar abonos, pesticidas, herbisidas, etc para poder seguir con sus cosechas y obtener mejores ganancias y tener una mejor vida con su esposa y sus hijos.
texts.en: Adrian is 38 years old and lives with his wife and two children, ages 10 and 12.  They attend school and all live at home.  [Adrian] is a farmer and has been for several years.  He raises corn and vegetables and covers his household expenses with the money from the sales of his basic grains and vegetables.  He is asking for this loan so that he can buy compost, pesticides, herbicides, etc. so that he can continue with his harvests, increase his earnings and have a better life for his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Celestina Del Carmen

texts.es: Celestina, junto a su esposo trabaja día a día para cubrir las necesidades de sus hijos, quienes son menores de edad etapa en la que son vulnerables y requieren de un cuidado especial. Celestina solicita el crédito para reparar parte del techo y pared que necesita mejora, ella espera continuar con el apoyo de crédito para poder terminar de acondicionar su casa lo cual no ha logrado por su bajo economia.
texts.en: Celestina and her husband work day to day to cover their children’s needs.  They are minors and are very vulnerable at this stage and need special care.  Celestina is asking for a loan in order to make repairs to her roof and a wall that needs improvements.  She hopes to continue with the help of this loan so that she can finish her house, which she has not been able to do because of financial reasons.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena, a 42-year-old married mother of one, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 10 years she has operated a carenderia (local eatery) business in the Philippines. Lucena Has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Lucena would like to build upon and expand her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Yurisela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yurisela ,29 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estelí, casada, vive en la casa de su mamá tiene un hijo pequeño de tres años.  Ella término su carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma pero por la falta de empleo tomo la decisión de hacer algo que le dejara dinero, su mamá le enseñó a preparar unos deliciosos nacatamales que es un desayuno típico muy popular en los hogares. Gracias a Dios tuvo mucho éxito este ha sido su primer negocios  con lo cual mantiene a su familia. 
Yurisela solicita este crédito para la compra de los productos que necesita para la  elaboración de los productos  como maíz, leña, condimentos, carne, manteca, chiltoma, cebolla. 
 Yurisela dice que este crédito le ayudara muchísimo por que podrá comprar más materia para producir más.  

Su meta futura es construir una casa para brindarle un techo digno a su hijo. Sus metas próximas es mejorar su puesto de venta y seguir haciendo sus deliciosos productos Yurisela cuenta sólo con el apoyo de su mamá en la elaboración de los nacatamales y lo distribuye en varios en  barrios de la ciudad de Estelí.
texts.en:
Yurisela is 29 years old and lives in the city of Esteli.  She is married, lives at her mother’s house, and has a three year old son.  She completed her studies for an agricultural engineer career but decided to do something that would generate an income, due to lack of employment opportunities.  Her mother taught her to make delicious nacatamales and this is a very popular breakfast in the home.  Thanks to God she has had much success and this is her first business which she uses to support her family.

Yurisela is asking for this loan in order to buy the products she needs to make things such as dried corn, firewood, condiments, meats, lard, peppers, and onions.

Yurisela says that this loan will be of great help to her because she will be able to buy more ingredients so she can produce more.

Her goal is to build a house to be able to provide a dignified roof for her son.  Her next goals are to improve her food stall and continue making her delicious products.  Yurisela has her mother’s support in making the nacatamales that she distributes to various neighborhoods in Esetli.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Sandra Estela

texts.es: doña sandra de 46 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hija de 23 años de edad viven en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros y tambien un molino desde hace varios años, su negocio esta ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito especialmente para comprar mercaderia para surtir su tienda para obtener mejores ganancias, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que tendra una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Sandra is 46 years old and lives with her husband and her 23 year old daughter in a home of her own.  She has a store where she sells primary needs products such as beans, milk, eggs, bread, and other things.  She also has a mill and has for various years.  Her business is located in her home and it’s very well known by the residents in the zone.  She has many customers because she has a very well stocked store.  She wants to grow the business and make a new investment, but needs capital so she is asking for a loan, specifically to buy merchandise with which to stock her store and improve her earnings.  She assures us that she will repay her loan and is confident that she will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her store.
